guild.description: Got a burning unpopular opinion you want to share? Spark some discussions!

guild.name: UnpopularOpinion

parent.body: Also once one side wins they'll make puppet enemies to justify further power grabs.
parent.body_html: Also once one side wins they'll make puppet enemies to justify further power grabs.

post.body:
It means;

1. The citizens have some backbone, will act in self-interest, and will resist government overreach. They aren’t doormats for the authorities to walk all over.

2. The police force isn’t made of a bunch of bitches, they have neither too little nor too much power, and they will have each other’s backs in court (you want that).

3. A good balance between the existence of a government and freedom of the citizenry is at hand.

This is a thing that should just be. Organized crime should flourish and the police should battle them. The winning side should ebb and flow.
post.body_html:
It means;

  1. The citizens have some backbone, will act in self-interest, and will resist government overreach. They aren’t doormats for the authorities to walk all over.

  2. The police force isn’t made of a bunch of bitches, they have neither too little nor too much power, and they will have each other’s backs in court (you want that).

  3. A good balance between the existence of a government and freedom of the citizenry is at hand.

This is a thing that should just be. Organized crime should flourish and the police should battle them. The winning side should ebb and flow.
post.title: Organized crime and a police force battling it is a sign of a healthy society.

body:
> In the orthodox you wouldn't really visit a church very often you're praying and serving in private.

The problem is it sets up a hierarchical church structure where people holding offices replace God. And most people blindly believe everything they tell them. Even evangelical protestants are too orthodox, let alone actual orthodox and catholics

> You very much can be considered guilty regardless of ignorance.

"If I didn't come and speak to them, *they would not have error*, but now they have no excuse for their error" - John 15:22
body_html:
In the orthodox you wouldn't really visit a church very often you're praying and serving in private.

The problem is it sets up a hierarchical church structure where people holding offices replace God. And most people blindly believe everything they tell them. Even evangelical protestants are too orthodox, let alone actual orthodox and catholics

You very much can be considered guilty regardless of ignorance.

"If I didn't come and speak to them, they would not have error, but now they have no excuse for their error" - John 15:22

guild.description:
"For God so loved the world, that He gave His only begotten Son, that whoever believes in Him shall not perish, but have eternal life. For God did not send the Son into the world to judge the world, but that the world might be saved through Him. He who believes in Him is not judged; he who does not believe has been judged already, because he has not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God. This is the judgment, that the Light has come into the world, and men loved the darkness rather than the Light, for their deeds were evil. For everyone who does evil hates the Light, and does not come to the Light for fear that his deeds will be exposed. But he who practices the truth comes to the Light, so that his deeds may be manifested as having been wrought in God."

May all personally encounter the presence and attention of the Lord God. 

Curiosity, questions, discussion, and prayer requests are welcome.

guild.description:
You are a holy inquisitor: uncover heresy, purge heretics.

![](https://files.catbox.moe/9k0zvb.gif)

"Raise buildings and sing songs in My Glory. In My name, pursue your arts and enshrine all Beauty. Let all people follow their every desire, sate their every hunger, and deny themselves no adventure. For it is in these things, and in other, that you will find the greatest pleasure, and it is through these things, and through each other, that you shall rise yourselves higher, even unto the steps of My Throne...You will take Pleasure in all that is, though your bodies will break and your souls be forfeit."

body:
> Because your an insufferable lolbert who worships the free market as if it were its self a god?

It's very flawed but the problem is that everything else is even worse. And if we have a 4 hour argument it's every bit as much yours.

> Go back to questioning weather or not pegging is moral.

What the hell does that have to do with this?

> Maybe you should begin to question your ideologies jewish beginnings

It makes sense that it's similar to some Jewish ideals, considering the Hebrew Bible is very important to both.
body_html:
Because your an insufferable lolbert who worships the free market as if it were its self a god?

It's very flawed but the problem is that everything else is even worse. And if we have a 4 hour argument it's every bit as much yours.

Go back to questioning weather or not pegging is moral.

What the hell does that have to do with this?

Maybe you should begin to question your ideologies jewish beginnings

It makes sense that it's similar to some Jewish ideals, considering the Hebrew Bible is very important to both.

post.body: I don't have hate in my heart for any religion, but there is nothing inherent to right wing ideology that requires it. Eastern conservative governments have shown that you can have a moral base without the need for a specific judeo christian ruleset.
post.body_html: I don't have hate in my heart for any religion, but there is nothing inherent to right wing ideology that requires it. Eastern conservative governments have shown that you can have a moral base without the need for a specific judeo christian ruleset.
post.title: Religion is holding back Conservatism.

guild.description:
Ask and answer questions.

Rules:

🤔 Posts must be questions. This is a community dedicated to Q&A discussion, so post titles must be in the form of a question.

⁉️ No loaded questions.

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

🥾 Breaking these rules will result in posts being kicked and possibly an exile.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.
